title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Ergonomic principles. Man-machine system, tractor reliability. Fatigue in tractor operation. Energy cost of tractor operation. Tractor operator’s working environment. Thermal stresses in tractor operation. Operator workplace design. Vibrator and noise: evaluation, reduction, application in tractor seat design. Biomedical aspects of tractor operation; Visual perception in tractor control panel design. Principle and design of ROPS, International standards and testing of ROPS. Computer application and automation in tractor design.
